tittle: The Digital Academy for Quranic Studies
desc1: A safe and engaging educational environment.
desc2: A selection of highly qualified teachers with top Sharia and educational certifications.
desc3: Short lessons tailored to fit your free time.
desc4: Interactive teaching strategies suitable for all age groups.
desc5: Accredited certificates that document your achievements at every level of learning.
short-desc: Irtaqi is a digital academy for teaching the Quran, where all interactions take place online. It emphasizes the teaching of our Islamic values and offers affordable subscription fees.
